s.text: The stories don't mention whether or not Albright and company were influenced by or mentioned to the president this week's New Yorker story by Seymour Hersh arguing that Pollard's intelligence take made its way to the Soviet Union.
But wait a second, it is an old shoe!

Inside pieces at the WP and NYT report that Clinton national security officials including Madeleine Albright and the director of the CIA have recommended that Clinton deny clemency to convicted spy Jonathan Pollard.

Inside pieces at the WP and NYT report that Clinton national security officials including Madeleine Albright and the director of the CIA have recommended that Clinton deny clemency to convicted spy Jonathan Pollard.

USA Today runs its Clinton defense story as the off-lead and goes instead with Michael Jordan's imminent retirement, a story that rates big front play at the NYT and a reefer at the LAT . Another sports story dominates much of the rest of the USAT front: the wildly accelerating prices sports franchises are fetching.

USA Today runs its Clinton defense story as the off-lead and goes instead with Michael Jordan's imminent retirement, a story that rates big front play at the NYT and a reefer at the LAT . Another sports story dominates much of the rest of the USAT front: the wildly accelerating prices sports franchises are fetching.
For the price--$800 million--that the Washington Redskins brought over the weekend, you could, notes the paper, buy a space shuttle flight, or Avis or Rolls-Royce.
The coverage emphasizes that the White House chose at this time not to file motions challenging the proceedings, motions that could have added weeks to the whole process.
